project.name: davinci-visual
project.description: A lightweight WebGL Mathematical visualization library.

classitems.description: Visual provides the common behavior for all Mesh (Geometry, Material) objects.
Constructs a `Visual` associated with the specified window and canvas.

params.name: $window
params.description: The window in which the visualization will operate.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The canvas element or the `id` property of a canvas element in which the visualization will operate.

classitems.description: Resizes the canvas to (width, height), and also sets the viewport to fit that size.
Render the 3D scene using the camera.
Vortex is used to represent geometric objects with a non-zero curl.
The version of the visual module.
Returns a grade zero Euclidean 3D multivector (scalar).
Returns a grade one Euclidean 3D multivector (vector) with the specified Cartesian coordinates.
Returns a grade two Euclidean 3D multivector (bivector) with the specified Cartesian coordinates.
Returns a grade three Euclidean 3D multivector (pseudoscalar).
